note:
Artist. Mom. Indigenous. Thinker. Curious. Creative.

Former Unix Network Engineer who has been kicking around the 'net since '92. studied Geology /GIS . map nerd. still Iove science!

I lift indigenous voices and discuss our issues. ( mixed native american & daughter is a descendant of historic chiefs)

I make art. I create DigitalArt, Sculpt, paint, Beadwork, fused & enameled glass

I care about Earth and our next generations and hope you do too!
